title: Yes to Jabs, No to Patents (with Toby Perkins MP)
itunes:title: Yes to Jabs, No to Patents (with Toby Perkins MP)
description:
Labour MP Toby Perkins says he supports mandatory vaccines for NHS staff even with the threat of losing tens of thousands of healthcare workers. He also tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker it's only a matter of time before Boris Johnson goes.

Plus Labour peer Shami Chakrabarti on the Government's Health and Care Bill and why she thinks Big Pharma should ditch its vaccine patents for the world.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
